OOC: Inu-Yasha was based on my research of Dragons which means he has breath 
weapons that he can use 3 times per day each before he needs a Recharge. He 
also has 2 Mega attacks Bahamut Zero and Tiamat which are one per day moves. 
Then he has melee weapons Claw/Claw/Bite and Lancers which are enegry 
lances.

Battle total uses:

2x Plasma
1xIce
2xfire
0xThunder

1xPlasma + 1 Fire = Bahamut Zero
